bilingual.target: 政治是一个复杂的领域。
他们经常争论政治问题。
我们经常讨论政治话题。
他对政治非常固执己见。

bilingual.source: She has a cynical view of politics.
bilingual.target: 她对政治持有愤世嫉俗的看法。

bilingual.source: This book is a parody of politics.
bilingual.target: 这本书是一部对政治的搞怪作品。
政治可以影响我们的日常生活。

list.abstract: politics是一个英语单词，可以用作名词，可以翻译为政治、政治学，等等。

yingyinNormal.en: Politics isn't really my area of expertise. Really?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我对政治可不感冒。是么？

yingyinNormal.en: Anything interesting? I'm reading about County Politics.
yingyinNormal.zh: 有什么好玩的吗？我在看郡时事政治。

yingyinNormal.en: But what are my politics these days? I'm not sure.
yingyinNormal.zh: 可我现在的政治理念是什么？我自己都不清楚了。

yingyinNormal.en: I never get involved in politics. You'd best be on your way.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我从不卷入政治，你最好继续走你的路。

yingyinNormal.en: Even if that were the case, the politics work in my favor too.
yingyinNormal.zh: 即使是这样，这在政治上对我也有好处。

yingyinNormal.en: We can announce together. That takes the politics out of this.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们可以一起宣布，这样其中的政治味就没那么浓了。

yingyinNormal.en: They've gone to a whole lot of trouble to make me look pretty bad. But that's politics.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们为玷污我的形象真是煞费苦心。但这就是政治

yingyinNormal.en: This debate deserves more than politics as usual It's important for our future.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对移民问题的辩论应该比平常的政治辩论更多这对我们的未来很重要。

yingyinNormal.en: Without the politics and bureaucracy, that undermine the integrity of government run spy organizations.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没有政治和官僚主义，专门瓦解政府手下的间谍组织。

yingyinNormal.en: United they stand. A union like none other. The unsplittable atom of American politics.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们站在一起，独一无二的联盟，成为美国政治中的不可分裂原子。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, that's politics. It's different. You take money wherever you can get it. No, this was our first home.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那是政治，不一样。筹钱要上天入地。这是我们第一个家。

yingyinNormal.en: We have to understand that this a paradigm shift. We have to start thinking beyond politics.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们必须明白这是种模式的转变，我们必须开始考虑超越政治范畴的问题了。

yingyinNormal.en: A solution that's elegant as hell. But then there's no elegance in modern politics. It's mostly hell.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这办法简洁得见了鬼。过现代政治哪有什么简洁可言。只剩下见鬼了。

yingyinNormal.en: At the Peak Tower, meet some of the giants of history, politics, and popular culture at Madam Tussauds.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在太平山凌霄阁中，您会在杜莎夫人蜡像馆中看见很多历史、政治和流行文化名人。

yingyinNormal.en: The issues the governor and the general raise are important ones. They transcend party affiliations and, quite frankly, politics.
yingyinNormal.zh: 州长和将军指出的问题都非常重要，这超越两党分歧，甚至超越政治。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, I'll make a statement and blame it on the politics of personal destruction. No, Doug, I'm afraid that's just not going to be enough.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我会发表声明说这是人身攻击式的政治手段。不，道格，恐怕这些仍不够。

yingyinNormal.en: You're saying you didn't blackmail them? I pressure a lot of people, Tom. That's part of politics. But never those two.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你是说你没胁迫过他们？我曾对许多人施压，汤姆，这是政治的一部分，但从没威胁过他们。

yingyinNormal.en: But, you see, in politics, stature is everything. And wouldn't you say that Willy C is getting shorter by the minute?
yingyinNormal.zh: 但你看，在政治中身高[声望]决定一切。你也能看出来小威·康每分钟都在变矮[底气不足]？

yingyinNormal.en: I congratulate you, brother, on a fine accord. You are now proven in battle and politics. Warrior and diplomat.
yingyinNormal.zh: 祝贺你，兄弟，你达成了利于我们的协议，你在战争和政治中都证明了自己，你既是勇士，又是外交家。

yingyinNormal.en: But while our politics may be divided at times, the American people stand united around supporting our troops and their families.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但尽管我们的政治意见可能不时面临分歧，美国人民始终与我们的部队和军属们站在一起。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 政治上；政治地；政党地
adj. 政治的；国家的；政府的；国事的；政治上的；政党的；党派的；对政治感兴趣的；取决于地位的；非原则的

examination_example.sentence: It is this apparent transcendence of <highlight>politics</highlight> that explains monarchs' continuing popularity as heads of state.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 正是这种明显的超越政治范畴的功能才能解释为什么君主作为国家元首能一直受欢迎。

examination_example.sentence: The framers of the Constitution envisioned law as having authority apart from <highlight>politics</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 宪法的制定者设想法律应该拥有独立于政治之外的权威。

examination_example.sentence: This and other similar cases raise the question of whether there is still a line between the court and <highlight>politics</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这起案件和其他类似案件提出了一个问题，即法院和政治之间是否仍然存在界限。
第三，他们现在主导着中左政治。

examination_example.sentence: Americans are less doubtful when it comes to <highlight>politics</highlight>: 73% expect to see a female president in their lifetime.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 美国人对未来政坛的预期分歧更小，73%的人认为在有生之年能看到女总统上台。

examination_example.sentence: For women seeking to climb to the highest levels of either <highlight>politics</highlight> or business, they have to do more than their male counterparts to prove themselves.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对于要想登上政界或商界最高层的女性来说，她们必须比男性付出更多来证明自己。

examination_example.sentence: Only about one-in-five say women's family responsibilities are a major reason why there aren't more females in top leadership positions in business and <highlight>politics</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 只有大约五分之一的人说，女性的家庭责任是商业和政治领域没有更多女性担任高层领导职务的主要原因。
